response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth surpasses $800,000, but I am willing to consider a negotiation if that would facilitate our transaction. My initial offer for this remarkable product is $950,000. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you require more information about the item. I am looking forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
